name: Tower (MrDonJohn)
description:
Mouse and Keyboard:

WASD - Walking

E - Health-Potion

F - Interacting

Left Mouse Button - Small Hit

Right Mouse Button - Great Hit

PS4 - Controller:

Left and Right - Walking

Square - Health-Potion

X - Interacting

R1 - Small Hit

R2 - Great Hit

Thanks to Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio for the music.

This Game is in a very early stage and was made for the Metroidvania Month 8 Jam, which was hosted by Falcon Nova.

I would consider this game as an hybrid with souls-like and metroidvania elements.

This is my first project I would call "game" and I used the Jam to learn the Unity Engine.

I hope you have fun with it but be aware of bugs.
